verses.roman:
kṛṣṇake kahaye keha--nara-nārāyaṇa
keho kahe, kṛṣṇa haya sākṣāṭ vāmana

synonyms: kṛṣṇake—Lord Kṛṣṇa; kahaye—says; keha—someone; nara-nārāyaṇa—Nara-Nārāyaṇa; keho—someone; kahe—says; kṛṣṇa—Lord Kṛṣṇa; haya—is; sākṣāt—directly; vāmana—Lord Vāmana.
translation: Some say that Śrī Kṛṣṇa is directly Nara-Nārāyaṇa. Others say that He is directly Vāmana.
